title: Oh no. Someone removed a pose. We'd better light a funeral pyre for the American Dream.
body:
It's such a travesty.
I can't even.
Oh the tears. They're flowing so much. I'm so offended that someone didn't like something I liked and saw it fit to be removed. I have to revolt against this unjust tyranny.
It's necessary.
Someone call Palpatine we have to nuke the site from orbit.
This will be the beginning of world war three.
I can guide a missile by satellite.

-

Like, seriously, for a bunch of people who dislike people who complain too much, you complain way too fucking much.
